catalog_info.title: Genomics of Species Evolution
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Permission of instructor. Instructor's permission. It is recommended that a basic evolution or population genetics course will have been taken (e.g. OEB 53 or OEB 242).
catalog_info.description: This discussion-based course will survey modern ideas about speciation, and how they have changed as a result of genomic approaches. As well as readings and discussions in class, the course will utilize live online video sessions with major players in the field of evolutionary genomics and speciation.
